nodes.text: Dupas Thomree was a Human male Diktat of Corellia who lived during the regime of the Galactic Empire. Thomree made a deal with Emperor Palpatine: Thomree could govern the Corellian sector as he wished (mostly free of Imperial mandates) as long as he paid taxes, war matériel, and homage to the Emperor. He was assassinated in 2 BBY.
The character's name is a playful nod to author Roger MacBride Allen's Bantam Books editor, Tom Dupree.
